claim: The New Adventures of Old Christine stars an American comedian.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The New Adventures of Old Christine  (  often shortened to simply Old Christine  )  is an American television sitcom starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus as Christine Campbell , a middle-aged divorced mother who struggles to keep pace with those around her .

claim: The New Adventures of Old Christine stars an American comedian.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Robert Andrew `` Andy '' Ackerman  (  September 19 , 1956  )  is an American director and producer and script editor who is best known for his work on Seinfeld , The New Adventures of Old Christine and the HBO series Curb Your Enthusiasm .
